text.section:
Upper limits on adjusted annual income may vary for different:
types of housing;
types of financing offered by the Program; and
regions.
Within the upper limits on adjusted annual income, lower income limit ranges and lower interest rates may be established for loans to households with adjusted annual incomes in the lower ranges.

Except for loans made under § 4-804(4) and (6) of this subtitle, the upper limits on adjusted annual income established under subsection (a) of this section may not exceed the median annual family income.
